column2: Fitch Rates Thermo Fisher's EUR2.6B Senior Notes 'BBB'; Outlook Stable (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK
column3: July 18 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB' rating to Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc.'s (Thermo Fisher) EUR2.6 billion senior notes offering. The proceeds will be used to partly finance the USD7.2 billion acquisition of Patheon N.V. The Rating Outlook is Stable. Thermo Fisher plans to finance the acquisition with $2 billion of equity and approximately $5.2 billion of unsecured notes and short-term debt. Free cash flow gen ~
